sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import dayjs from 'dayjs' import './Meteo.css'; const DayCard = ({ reading }) => { let newDate = new Date(); const weekday = reading.dt * 1000 newDate.setTime(weekday) const imgURL = `http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/${reading.weather[0].icon}@2x.png` console.log(reading) return (
{dayjs(newDate).format('D MMMM')}

{dayjs(newDate).format('dddd')}

{Math.round(reading.temp.day)} °C

{reading.weather[0].description}

{}
) } export default DayCard;
